thread.title: Munchery hires La Boulange founder Pascal Rigo
thread.title_full: Munchery hires La Boulange founder Pascal Rigo - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Amanda Gold
title: Munchery hires La Boulange founder Pascal Rigo
text:
Photo: Santiago Mejia, Special To The Chronicle Pascal Rigo, pictured inside La Boulangerie de San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015, in San Francisco, Calif. Rigo is reopening several several shuttered La Boulange shops as La Boulangerie de San Francisco and has now been hired by Munchery. Pascal Rigo, pictured inside La Boulangerie de San Francisco,...
If you want to expand your business, you might want to hire a Starbucks guy. Pascal Rigo, pictured inside La Boulangerie de San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015, in San Francisco, Calif. Rigo is reopening several several shuttered La Boulange shops as La Boulangerie de San Francisco and has now been hired by Munchery. Pascal Rigo, pictured inside La Boulangerie de San Francisco,...
